hero.title: Bringing you the
hero.text: The freshest sandwiches you can make are with Baker's Inn soft white loaf.

homeAbout.title: About Baker's Inn
homeAbout.text: It all started back in the eighties when Baker's Inn was just a small confectionery company that employed 40 people and produced about 30,000 loaves a day. We now aim to provide a nourishing, convenient and accessible answer to hunger’s call.

FactoryTour.title: Book A Factory Tour
FactoryTour.text: Keen on seeing how Baker’s inn products are made? Are you interested in a field trip day for your school’s class? Get in touch with us to book a tour of our factory that is closest to you. Fill in the booking form and we will get back to you.

RequestDonation.title: Request A Donation
RequestDonation.text: If you are holding an event that you wish to have us donate to, we’re more than glad to help. Fill in the donation request form for us to best understand how we can increase your event’s impact in the local community

HomeKids.title: Kid's Corner
HomeKids.text: Let your children join the fun. Explore a place with exciting games and the top winners stand a chance to win exciting monthly prizes!

PromoNotifications.title: Get Notified about promotions we offer
